entry.title: Sunday night: Clearing. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Clearing early this evening. Fog patches developing near midnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 05 March 2023
